overview.title: Overview
overview.content: This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal data when you use our website and services. We take your privacy seriously and are committed to protecting your personal information in accordance with applicable data protection laws, particularly the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

data.title: Personal Data We Process
data.content:
We collect and process the following personal data:
- Basic account information (name, email)
- Profile information (age, gender, height, weight)
- Training data (activities, workouts, performance metrics)
- Technical data (IP address, browser type, device information)
- Usage data (how you interact with our services)

legal.title: Legal Basis
legal.content:
We process your personal data based on:
- Your consent
- Performance of our contract with you
- Our legitimate interests
- Legal obligations we must comply with

collection.title: How We Collect Data
collection.content:
We collect personal data when you:
- Create an account
- Complete your profile
- Upload training data
- Use our services
- Connect third-party services (e.g., Strava)
- Contact our support

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve your experience and analyze how our services are used. You can control cookie settings through your browser preferences.

analytics.title: Analytics and Performance
analytics.content: We use analytics tools to understand how our services are used and to improve them. This includes analyzing training patterns and user behavior to enhance our AI-powered recommendations.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content: We may share data with trusted third parties who assist us in operating our website, conducting our business, or serving our users. All third parties are obligated to keep your information confidential.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content:
Under GDPR, you have the right to:
- Access your personal data
- Correct inaccurate data
- Request deletion of your data
- Object to processing
- Data portability
- Withdraw consent

To exercise these rights, please contact us at contact@example.com

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page and updating the effective date.
